original_text: So David and Abishai went among Saul's army that night. They saw that Saul was asleep in the middle of the camp. He had pushed his spear into the ground near his head. Abner and the army were asleep around Saul.
korean_text: 다윗과 아비새가 밤에 그 백성에게 나아가 본즉 사울이 진영 가운데 누워 자고 창은 머리 곁 땅에 꽂혀 있고 아브넬과 백성들은 그를 둘러 누웠는지라

sentences.original_text: So David and Abishai went among Saul's army
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 다윗과 아비새가 사울의 군대 속으로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: They saw that Saul was asleep
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사울이 잠들어 있는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: in the middle of the camp
He had pushed his spear into the ground
Abner and the army were asleep
